content:
Main Topic: Builder's Obligations

| Subtopic | Description |
| --- | --- |
| Compliance with contract | - Carrying out and completing the building works in accordance with the contract |
|  | - Meeting the requirements of the contract documents |
|  | - Providing all necessary labor, materials, equipment, and services |
|  | - Complying with all applicable laws, regulations, and bylaws |
| Statutory warranties | - Providing statutory warranties as required by law |
|  | - Warranties for defective workmanship, materials, and structural defects |
|  | - Warranties for non-compliance with building standards and codes |
| Health and safety | - Ensuring compliance with health and safety regulations and standards |
|  | - Providing a safe working environment for workers and the public |
|  | - Using appropriate safety equipment and practices |
| Building completion | - Ensuring the building works are completed and handed over to the owner |
|  | - Achieving practical completion as defined in the contract |
|  | - Completing minor omissions and defects after practical completion |
|  | - Providing the owner with a notice of practical completion |
| Mandatory conditions | - Complying with mandatory conditions as set out in the contract |
|  | - Ensuring the works are carried out in accordance with mandatory conditions |
